about_the_game:
A cozy crafting narrative adventure game, where you play as a bunny on his path to become the Legendary Easter Bunny! Use Enchanted eggs to heal your friends of the forest!

Features:

🥚 Craft and Deliver Magical Eggs to Save the local animals

  • Craft, customize and deliver enchanted eggs to suit each NPC’s needs.

  • Gain access to advanced recipes by building relationships with NPCs, and completing quests.

🌎 Explore a Diverse Landscapes

  • Journey through vibrant ecosystems, from lush forests to desserts and spooky swamp environments.

  • Explore every corner of the map to find secret locations, rare resources, and bonus content.

🤝 Build Relationships and Unlock Rewards

  • Form meaningful bonds with NPCs through a three-level relationship system.

  • Unlock powerful upgrades, rare items, hidden blueprints, and special egg crafting recipes by helping your new friends.

  • Interact with a choice driven narrative system that influences your standing within the animal community

⚙️ Outsmart sneaky traps

  • Neutralize traps by solving puzzles or using the Bunny's enhanced “magic pellets”, a versatile tool for weighing down pressure plates, and jamming gears.

🧩 Engaging Puzzles and Challenges

  • Solve puzzles to unlock new paths, gather crafting materials, and discover hidden secrets.

  • Use creativity and strategy to meet the unique challenges presented by the Thrae.

🌿 Foraging and Resource Collection

  • Search the world to gather essential resources like berries, twigs, golden sap, and wildflowers to craft magical eggs.

  • Fish for Metal scraps to help clean the environment and craft tools to remove the thrae's traps from the region.

🌟 Uncover the Easter Bunny’s Mysteries

  • Learn the origin of the Easter Bunny and his magical eggs through captivating storylines.

🎶 Immersive Visuals and Sound

  • Delight in a whimsical art style inspired by North American nature and wildlife.

  • Enjoy an enchanting original soundtrack that combines atmospheric melodies with regional musical influences.

name: Thrae
short_description: Embark on a heartwarming adventure with a fluffy bunny on their path to become the Legendary Easter Bunny! Deliver enchanted eggs to furry friends to help them survive, while dodging and outsmarting the sneaky traps set by the Thrae.
